title: Rav Rafael Yehuda Berdugo Passes
body: Rav Rafael Yehuda Berdugo zt”l, a beloved marbitz Torah and rov, passed away. He served his community in Migdal HaEmek for many years and later resided in Yerushalayim's Bayit Vegan neighborhood.

title: New Jersey Tax Relief
body: New Jersey homeowners with gross income under $250,000 may be eligible for $1,000-$1,500 in property tax relief. Renters get $450, senior citizens may qualify for more. Deadline today.
